snippet: Chelsea have been foolish to allow Spain playmaker Juan Mata's imminent transfer to Premier League rivals Manchester United, the club's former crowd favourite Alan Hudson said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Foolish to Sell Mata, Says Hudson
headline.main: Chelsea Foolish to Sell Mata, Says Hudson

lead_paragraph: Chelsea have been foolish to allow Spain playmaker Juan Mata's imminent transfer to Premier League rivals Manchester United, the club's former crowd favourite Alan Hudson said on Friday.
